name: raiderio
title: RaiderIO
description: View RaiderIO profiles for any character
author: joe_fensler

commands.name: favorite-characters
commands.title: Favorite Characters
commands.description: A list of favorited characters on RaiderIO

commands.name: lookup-character
commands.title: Lookup Character
commands.description: Open a character profile on RaiderIO

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
